descriptor-list.name: PremTerm
descriptor-list.value: "Periodic premium term"~if(am("FirstStart=Per prem", "Date") > 0, format(datediff(am("FirstStart=Per prem", "Date"), am("LastStart=Per prem", "Date"), am("FirstStart=Per prem", "Frequency"), 1, 1) + 1), "None")

event-value.expression: set(decAmount, if(decSurrender > 0, decSurrender, decAccBalance + decBalance)), decAmount - (decAmount * (1 / (1 + (decValue / 100))))
set(decNewValue, default(decNewValue, decValue)), set(decNewValue, round(decNewValue + if(intSequence > 0 and intSequence mod intPeriodsPerStep = 0, decNewValue * (decGradPercent / 100), 0.0)))
set(decNewValue, default(decNewValue, decValue)), set(decNewValue, round(decNewValue + if(intSequence > 0 and intSequence mod intPeriodsPerStep = 0, decNewValue * (decGradPercent / 100), 0.0)))

descriptor-list.name: Status
descriptor-list.value: Balance: " + cashflow("StrBal") +, Interest: " + formatcurrency(cashflow("IntBefore")) + "+" + formatcurrency(cashflow("IntAfter")) + "=" + formatcurrency(cashflow("IntTotal"))

event-value.expression: set(decNewValue, default(decNewValue, decValue)), set(decNewValue, round(decNewValue + if(intSequence > 0 and intSequence mod intPeriodsPerStep = 0, decNewValue * (decGradPercent / 100), 0.0)))
set(decNewValue, default(decNewValue, decValue)), set(decNewValue, round(decNewValue + if(intSequence > 0 and intSequence mod intPeriodsPerStep = 0, decNewValue *  (decGradPercent / 100), 0.0)))
set(decNewValue, default(decNewValue, decValue)), set(decNewValue, round(decNewValue + if(intSequence > 0 and intSequence mod intPeriodsPerStep = 0, decNewValue * (decGradPercent / 100), 0.0)))

set(decIntPrev, am("IntPrev", "Value")), set(decIntPrev, if(decIntPrev = 0, decValue, decIntPrev)), set(decResult, roundfraction(decValue + decMargin, .125)), set(decResult, if(decIntPrev = 0 or decAdjustCapPlus = 0, decResult, min(decIntPrev + decAdjustCapPlus, decResult))), set(decResult, if(decIntPrev = 0, decResult, max(decIntPrev - decAdjustCapMinus, decResult))), set(decResult, if(decLifeCapPlus = 0, decResult, min(decLifeCapPlus, decResult))), set(decResult, max(decLifeCapMinus, decResult))
decValue + decAddAmount + if(intSequence mod intPeriodsPerBump = intPeriodsUntilBump, decBumpAmount, 0)
